Previewing a Booklet

Once you have begun adding reports to the Booklet structure, the CLOSE, SAVE, and PREVIEW buttons will activate. Clicking CLOSE exits the Booklet creation process and clears all changes made. Clicking SAVE will prompt you to create a name for the new Booklet and then save to your catalog. Clicking PREVIEW allows you to view how the Booklet will operate, even before you save your work.

After you click PREVIEW, the first report in the Booklet will execute and display on the screen with the Booklet Composition grid still visible. You can now page through the individual reports in one of two ways:

9.Â  Clicking the left/right arrow buttons above the grid to move back and forth throughout the booklet.

10. Clicking on the report name in the Booklet Structure box (Note: this is not available in VIEW mode, described later)
